aboutme.desc: Hi! I'm Guillaume, a passionate Python developer who enjoys turning ideas into efficient, automated, and reliable software solutions. With a strong focus on clean code and problem-solving, I love creating tools and applications that simplify complex tasks and improve productivity. Whether it's scripting, web development, or working with data, I'm always eager to learn and take on new challenges. My goal is to build meaningful software that makes a difference.
aboutme.desc2: Let's connect and build something great together!

scraper.title: Interactive Web Scraper
scraper.description: This project lets you dynamically scrape any website. Enter a URL, select the HTML tags you want to extract (titles, images, links, etc.), and retrieve everything in CSV format.
scraper.info: This project is integrated into this website.

tool.error: An error has occurred during scraping.

github.title: GitHub Profile Analyzer
github.description: Enter a GitHub username to obtain statistics such as the number of repositories, stars, the date of the last commit and the most frequently used language.
github.info: The data is provided in real time via the GitHub API.
github.error: User not found or server error.
